channel.title: Chris Tse on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Chris Tse on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Royalties
item.description: Chris Tse Monegraph person I am going to talk about rights systems. A system that lets us trade rights, like to make movie off of a character, off of the things that Disney makes whenever I buy toys for my two year-old son. This is used in intellectual property. Monegraph is known as the media rights blockchain-ish company. What we discovered about how to model rights, but why is it important, kind of extending and maybe contradicting the point further that the rights are not just the identity mapped to it in the blockchain, it’s just, in a lot of cases you are trading, selling or lending rights.
